Package kaczmarczyk.projects

Class User

java.lang.Object
kaczmarczyk.projects.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, UserValidatable
public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, UserValidatable
User is a cashier that do the basic ticket services for the cinema

      public User​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, boolean isAdmin, java.lang.String password) throws FormatException
      Creates a user instance for params Cinema.addUser(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, boolean, java.lang.String)
      Parameters:
      name - The user's name
      surname - The user's surname
      isAdmin - The user's status in the system
      password - The user's password
      Throws:
      FormatException - Thrown if the format of the password or the name or the surname is wrong

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword​(java.lang.String pass)
      Validates the format of the password
      Specified by:
      validatePassword in interface UserValidatable
      Parameters:
      pass - Password given
      Returns:
      true - if the password meet requirements, false - otherwise Requirements: 4 - 40 chars, at least one small letter, at least one capital letter, at least one digit.
